content_html: This year’s Burns Lake Trade Show drew an estimated 1,994 attendees over the course of the weekend, marking another successful chapter in what has become a signature event for the community. Organized by the Burns Lake & District Chamber of Commerce, the show featured dozens of vendors, live entertainment, prize draws, and fundraising efforts—all of which contributed to a vibrant and well-received gathering. “We had no complaints from vendors or attendees,” said Randi Amendt, manager of the Chamber. “All positive feedback.” Over 40 exhibitors took part in the event, with booths spread across both indoor and outdoor spaces.
